name: OSCELOT DSKTOOL
description: A Django/Python-based RESTful version of the Original York DSK tool for Heroku and Docker.

BLACKBOARD_LEARN_INSTANCE.description: The FQDN for your Blackboard Learn instance. E.g.: demo.blackboard.com. Do NOT include the protocol (http:// or https://)

APPLICATION_KEY.description: Paste the APPLICATION KEY provided when you registered your Application in the Blackboard Developer Portal. (Contains hyphens)

APPLICATION_SECRET.description: Paste the APPLICATION SECRET provided when you registered your Application. (Contains no hyphens)

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: Paste the DJANGO SECRET from this website: https://djskgen.herokuapp.com (remove the single quotes)

DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: Leave this set as is or edit for your custom domain for successful deploy.

DJANGO_DEBUG.description: Leave this set as is for production deploy. May set to True in non-production environments.

DISABLE_COLLECTSTATIC.description: Leave this set as is for successful deploy.
